Name: Escape Fantasy
About the game: In a purely one-developer indie game, you are a little guy trying to Escape from a rare Fantasy world. Level by level you have to solve a nice puzzle by pushing buttons, unlocking doors, changing gravity on things, jumping, double jumping, sliding on walls, moving objects and, often, by doing some of those things at the right time
